amendment.description: Amendment was originally agreed to and sought to reduce funding for animal damage control program operations by $10 million. See Roll Call No. 259. \ On a separate vote in the full House the amendment was rejected. See Roll Call No. 263.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Wildlife Service livestock protection program by $10 million.

action.text: On agreeing to the Bass amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 193 (Roll No. 259).
Mr. Skeen demanded a separate vote on the Bass amendment (A006).
On agreeing to the Bass amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 232 (Roll No. 263).
